inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has 4 or more digivolution cards, it gets +1000 DP.
[Your Turn] This Digimon gets +1000 DP.
[Your Turn] <Security Attack +1> (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card).
[Your Turn] When this Digimon is blocked, gain 3 memory.

effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] For every 2 digivolution cards, this Digimon gains <Security Attack +1>.
[Your Turn] All of your Red Digimon gain +1000 DP.
[Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP for the turn.
security_effect_description_eng: [Security] Add this card to your hand.

card_name_jpn: スターライト・エクスプロージョン
effect_description_eng: [Main] All of your Security Digimon get +7000 DP until the end of your opponent's next turn.
security_effect_description_eng: [Security] Add this card to your hand.

effect_description_eng: [Main] Delete up to 2 of your opponent's Digimon with 4000 DP or less.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon.

inherited_effect_description_eng: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has the [Appmon] trait, <Draw 1>.

effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon card with the [Reptile] or [Dragonkin] trait, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] This Digimon gets +2000 DP.

effect_description_eng: Inherited Effect [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a card is removed from your opponent's security stack, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

Inherited Effect [Your Turn] While your opponent has no Digimon with with as many or more digivolution cards than this Digimon, this Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.).
Inherited Effect [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a card is added to your security stack, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
Inherited Effect [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your effects suspends a Tamer, this Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn.
Inherited Effect [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] By returning 3 cards with the [D-Brigade] or [DigiPolice] trait from your trash to the top of the deck, this Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn.
Inherited Effect [Your Turn] When a Digimon card with the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait is trashed from your hand, this Digimon may digivolve into that card.
[Start of Your Main Phase] If you have a Tamer with [Tai Kamiya] in its name, this Digimon may digivolve into [Greymon] in your hand without paying the cost.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Greymon] or [Omnimon] in its name, it gets +2000 DP.

effect_description_eng: Inherited Effect [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.
[All Turns] Players can't play Digimon by effects.
＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[When Attacking] This Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. Then, if you have a Tamer with [Tai Kamiya] in its name, gain 1 memory.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Greymon] or [Omnimon] in its name, it gets +2000 DP.

effect_description_eng: [Start of Your Main Phase] For the turn, when this Digimon would digivolve into a card with [Tyrannomon] in its name, or the [Dinosaur] or [Ceratopsian] trait, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [End of Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has [Tyrannomon] in its name, or the [Dinosaur] or [Ceratopsian] trait, it may attack.

effect_description_eng:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost.)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Ace Overflow ＜-3＞ (As this card moves from the field or under a card to an area other than those, lose 3 memory.)

effect_description_eng: Inherited Effect [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less.
＜Raid＞ (When this Digimon attacks, you may switch the target of attack to 1 of your opponent's unsuspended Digimon with the highest DP.)

[When Digivolving] ＜Blitz＞ (If your opponent has 1 or more memory, this Digimon may attack.)
[All Turns] While your opponent has 1 or more memory, they can't play Digimon with 6000 DP or less, and this Digimon gets +4000 DP.

[On Play] [When Digivolving] Play 1 [Amon of Crimson Flame] Token (Digimon/Red/6000 DP/＜Rush＞) and 1 [Umon of Blue Thunder] Token. (Digimon/Yellow/6000 DP/＜Blocker＞)
[All Turns] When this Digimon would digivolve or leave the battle area, delete all of your [Amon of Crimson Flame]s and [Umon of Blue Thunder]s. If you deleted a Digimon with this effect, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
Inherited Effect [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, trash its bottom 2 digivolution cards.
[Start of Your Main Phase] Trash any 1 digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, this Digimon can't be blocked for the turn.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Opponent's Turn] When this Digimon would be deleted, you may play 1 [Gomamon] from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.

effect_description_eng: ＜Evade＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may suspend it to prevent that deletion.)
[When Attacking] Trash any 1 digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon with no digivolution cards to its owner's hand.

[When Digivolving] Trash any 2 digivolution cards from your opponent's Digimon.
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Until the end of your opponent's turn, 1 of your opponent's Digimon with as many or fewer digivolution cards as this Digimon can't attack.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Until the end of your opponent's turn, 1 of your opponent's Digimon with as many or fewer digivolution cards as this Digimon can't attack.

effect_description_eng: Inherited Effect [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon attacks, trash its bottom 2 digivolution cards.
＜Evade＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may suspend it to prevent that deletion.)

[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost.)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Trash any 2 digivolution cards from your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards to the hand.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Ace Overflow ＜-3＞ (As this card moves from the field or under a card to an area other than those, lose 3 memory.)

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Return all level 3 Digimon to their owner's hands.

＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a digivolution card of an opponent's Digimon is trashed, this Digimon can't be deleted in battle until the end of your opponent's turn.

[When Digivolving] Trash any 3 digivolution cards from your opponent's Digimon.
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has no Digimon with as many or more digivolution cards as this Digimon, unsuspend this Digimon.

[On Play] [When Digivolving] By returning 1 of your opponent's level 3 Digimon or 1 of your Digimon to the hand, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon with an equal or lower level to the hand.
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When another Digimon is returned to the hand, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
Inherited Effect [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -2000 DP for the turn.
[On Play] Add the top card of your security stack to the hand. Then, you may place 1 card with [Sukamon] in its name from your hand on top of your security stack.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [On Deletion] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn.

effect_description_eng: [Start of Your Main Phase] Search your security stack. This Digimon may digivolve into a yellow Digimon card with the [Vaccine] trait among them without paying the cost. Then, shuffle your security stack. If digivolved by this effect, you may place 1 yellow card with the [Vaccine] trait from your hand at the bottom of your security stack.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a card is added to your security stack, gain 1 memory.

effect_description_eng: [Security] At the end of the battle, play this card without paying the cost.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [On Deletion] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -3000 DP for the turn.

effect_description_eng:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost.)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] If you have 5 or fewer Security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. Then, for the turn, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -1000 DP for each card in your security stack.

effect_description_eng:
[Security] If you have 3 or more cards with [Sukamon] in their names in your trash, you may play 1 level 6 Digimon card with [Etemon] in its name from your hand without paying its cost.
[On Deletion] Place this card at the bottom of your security stack.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [On Deletion] Place 1 [Etemon] from your trash at the bottom of your security stack.

effect_description_eng:
＜Armor Purge＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may trash the top card of this Digimon to prevent that deletion.)
[On Play] By placing 1 Digimon card with [Numemon] in its name, from your trash as this Digimon's bottom digivolution card, gain 2 memory.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Monzaemon] or [Numemon] in its name, it gains ＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)

effect_description_eng:
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may place 1 Tamer card from your hand on top of your security stack.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When you play a Tamer, you may play 1 level 3 Digimon from your hand without paying its cost.

[When Digivolving] ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a card is added to your security stack, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -7000 DP and this Digimon gains ＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.), for the turn.
[On Play] By suspending this Digimon, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 green card among them to your hand. Return the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.
[On Play] By suspending 1 of your Digimon, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
[Start of Your Main Phase] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gains "[All Turns] When this Digimon becomes suspended, lose 2 memory." until the end of their turn.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve, if you have a green Tamer, reduce the cost by 1.

effect_description_eng: ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)

inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve, if you have a green Tamer, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. During your opponent's next unsuspend phase, all of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less don't unsuspend.

[When Attacking] If attacking a Digimon with DP higher than this Digimon, this Digimon may digivolve into 1 level 6 Digimon card with [Leomon] in its name in your hand for a cost of 6, ignoring its digivolution requirements.

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] 1 of your opponent's Digimon doesn't unsuspend until the end of their turn.

[End of Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] By suspending 1 of your Digimon, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 2 green Digimon cards among them to your hand. Return the rest to deck bottom of your deck.

＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.

[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an effect suspends a Digimon or Tamer, you may unsuspend this Digimon.

＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
[When Digivolving] By unsuspending this Digimon, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
[End of Your Turn] This Digimon may attack an opponent's Digimon.
Inherited Effect ＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[On Play] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [D-Brigade] or [DigiPolice] trait among them to your hand. Place the rest at either the top or bottom of your deck.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon would leave the battle area other than by your effect, by deleting 1 of your other Digimon with the [D-Brigade] trait, prevent it from leaving play.

effect_description_eng: [On Deletion] ＜Save＞ (You may place this card under one of your Tamers.)
inherited_effect_description_eng: ＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)

inherited_effect_description_eng: ＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)

effect_description_eng: [When Attacking] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 card with the [D-Brigade] or [DigiPolice] trait with a play cost of 3 or less among them without paying the cost. Return the rest the the bottom of the deck.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon would leave the battle area other than by one of your effects, by deleting 1 of your other Digimon with the [D-Brigade] trait, prevent it from leaving.

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] By returning 1 Digimon card from your opponent's trash to the top of their deck, gain 1 memory.
[All Turns] This Digimon can't be deleted by your opponent's effects.

[On Deletion] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Monzaemon] in its name from among them to your hand, and play 1 Digimon card with [Numemon] in its name from among them without paying its cost. Return the rest to the bottom of your deck.
inherited_effect_description_eng: ＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 card with the [D-Brigade] or [DigiPolice] trait with a play cost of 4 or less among them without paying the cost. Trash the rest.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When one of your other Digimon are deleted, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 [Commandramon] without paying its cost. Trash the rest.

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Your opponent reveals the top 3 cards of their deck. ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. (Trash the top card. You can't trash past level 3 cards.) for each Digimon card among them. Return the cards to either the top or bottom of the deck.

[On Play] [When Digivolving] By trashing 1 card with [Numemon] in its name from your hand, gain 2 memory.
[On Deletion] You may play 1 level 5 or lower Digimon card with [Numemon] or [Monzaemon] in its name from your hand without paying the cost.

[On Play] [When Digivolving] Your opponent reveals the top 3 cards of their deck. Choose 1 Digimon card among them, and delete up to its play cost's total worth of your opponent's Digimon. Return the revealed cards to either the top or bottom of the deck.

[When Digivolving] Delete up to 7 play cost's total worth of your opponent's Digimon.
[Opponent's Turn] All of your Digimon with the [D-Brigade] trait gain ＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.).
[End of Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play up to 7 play cost's total worth of cards with the [D-Brigade] or [DigiPolice] trait among them without paying the costs. Trash the rest.
Inherited Effect [On Deletion] Gain 1 memory.
Inherited Effect [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your effects trashes a card in your hand, gain 1 memory.
[Start of Your Main Phase] By placing 1 [Eiji Nagasumi] from your hand or trash as this Digimon's bottom digivolution card, gain 1 memory.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you play a card with the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait, gain 1 memory.

inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When your card with the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait is played, gain 1 memory.

effect_description_eng:
[On Play] [When Attacking] Trash the top 3 cards of your deck.
[Your Turn] This Digimon gets +1000 DP for every 3 cards in your trash.
[On Deletion] Trash 1 card in your opponent's hand without looking.

[When Digivolving] By trashing 1 card in your hand, delete 1 of your Digimon with the lowest level and 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the lowest level.
[On Deletion] You may play 1 [Agumon] from your trash without paying the cost. If you have a Tamer with [Tai Kamiya] in its name, that Digimon gains ＜Rush＞ for the turn. (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play.)

[On Play] [When Digivolving] Trash the top 2 cards of both players' decks.
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a card in your opponent's deck is trashed, gain 1 memory.

[End of Your Turn] Delete this Digimon and ＜Draw 2＞ (Draw 2 cards from your deck.) Then, you may return 1 [Loogamon] from your trash to your hand. [On Deletion] You may trash up to 3 [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait cards from your hand. Then, delete 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower Digimon. For each card you trashed with this effect, increase this level by 1.

[When Digivolving] You may play 1 level 3 or lower card with the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait from your trash without paying its cost. If [Eiji Nagasumi] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, increase the level by 1.
[When Attacking] By trashing 1 card in your hand, gain 1 memory.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you play a card with the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait, you may unsuspend this Digimon.

effect_description_eng:
[When Digivolving] [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] For every 10 cards in your trash, trash the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has 10 or more cards in their trash, this Digimon gains ＜Security A. +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)

[When Digivolving] You may play 1 level 4 or lower card with the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait from your trash without paying its cost. If [Eiji Nagasumi] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, increase the number of Digimon you can play with this effect by 2.
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] By deleting 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower Digimon, unsuspend this Digimon. For each of your Digimon, add 1 to the level this effect may choose.
[Your Turn] Your turn end condition is the opponent having 3 or more memory.

[Start of Your Main Phase] 1 of your Digimon with the [Vaccine] trait gets +2000 DP for the turn.
[Your Turn] When a card is removed from your opponent's security stack, by suspending this Tamer, gain 1 memory.

[Your Turn] When a card is trashed from under one of your opponent's Digimon, by suspending this Tamer, gain 1 memory.

[Your Turn] When an effect suspends a Digimon, by suspending this Tamer, gain 1 memory.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

effect_description_eng:
[Security] Play this card without paying the cost.
[Start of Your Main Phase] If your opponent has a Digimon, gain 1 memory.
[Main] ＜Mind Link＞ to 1 of your Digimon with [Numemon] or [Monzaemon] in its name or the [DigiPolice] trait. (Place this Tamer as that Digimon's bottom digivolution card if there are no Tamer cards in its digivolution cards.)
inherited_effect_description_eng:
[All Turns] While this Digimon has [Numemon] or [Monzaemon] in its name or the [DigiPolice] trait, this Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.) and ＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)
[End of All Turns] You may play 1 [Satsuki Tamahime] from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.

effect_description_eng:
[Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

[All Turns] While this Digimon has the [Dark Animal] or [SoC] trait, this Digimon gains ＜Alliance＞ (When this Digimon attacks, by suspending 1 of your other Digimon, add the suspended Digimon's DP to this Digimon and it gains ＜Security A. +1＞ for the attack.) and ＜Blocker＞ (This Digimon can block in the blocker timing.)
[End of All Turns] You may play 1 [Eiji Nagasumi] from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying the cost.

effect_description_eng:
[On Play] You may reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 level 3 Digimon card and 1 non-white Tamer card among them to your hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck.
[Opponent's Turn] When an opponent's level 5 or higher Digimon attacks, by suspending this Tamer, move 1 of your Digimon in your breeding area to your battle area.

Takaishi] in its name, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] You may play 1 [Patamon] from your hand or trash without paying the cost. Then, add this card to your hand.

・1 opponent's Digimon gets -6000 DP for the turn.
・By deleting 1 of your [Angemon], place 1 of your opponent's Digimon at the bottom of their security stack.

inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects. Then, add this card to your hand.

effect_description_eng: [Main] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, if you have a Tamer with [Mimi Tachikawa] in its name, 1 of your opponent's Digimon doesn't unsuspend until the end of their turn.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects. Then, add this card to your hand.

effect_description_eng: [Main] 1 of your non-white Digimon may digivolve into a Digimon card with [Sukamon] in its name in your hand without paying the cost, ignoring its digivolution requirements.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Until the end of your turn, change 1 of your opponent's Digimon into being white and having 3000 DP and an original name of [Sukamon]

effect_description_eng: [Main] ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. (Trash the top card. You can't trash past level 3 cards.) Then, by returning 3 cards with the [D-Brigade] or [DigiPolice] trait from your trash to the top of the deck, delete up to 6 play cost's total worth of your opponent's Digimon.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects.

effect_description_eng: [Main] Trash the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, 1 of your Digimon with [Devimon] in its name gains ＜Security A. +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects.

effect_description_eng:
When one of your effects trashes this card in your hand, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck.)
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon.
inherited_effect_description_eng: Security Effect [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effects.

effect_description_eng:
While you have a Tamer with [Tai Kamiya] in its name and your opponent has a Digimon with 10000 DP or more, 1 of your [Agumon] may digivolve into this card in your hand for a cost of 4, ignoring its digivolution requirements.
[When Digivolving] This Digimon gains ＜Raid＞ for the turn. (When this Digimon attacks, you may switch the target of attack to 1 of your opponent's unsuspended Digimon with the highest DP.) Then, it may attack.
[When Attacking] If you have a Tamer, this Digimon gains ＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.) and ＜Piercing＞ for the turn. (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)

[When Attacking] By deleting this Digimon, activate 1 of the effects below:
・Place 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the [Virus] trait at the bottom of their security stack.
・1 opponent's Digimon gets -5000 DP for the turn.
[On Deletion] Place this card at the bottom of your security stack. Then, if you have a Tamer in play, you may hatch a Digi-Egg in your breeding area.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [On Deletion] Place 1 yellow Digimon with the [Vaccine] trait from your hand at the bottom of your security stack.
